common.browseAndConnect: Browse and connect with skilled freelancers in your area
common.searchPlaceholder: Search freelancers by name, skills, or location...

hero.title: Find the Perfect Freelancer
hero.subtitle: Connect with skilled professionals for your projects
hero.description: Join our platform to find talented freelancers or showcase your skills to potential clients

instant.title: Instant Booking
instant.description: Find and book local freelancers instantly for your urgent needs

scheduling.title: Smart Scheduling
scheduling.description: Easy scheduling with real-time availability and calendar integration

secure.title: Secure Platform
secure.description: Safe and secure payments with verified professionals

whyEinsatz.title: Why Choose Einsatz?
whyEinsatz.subtitle: Join thousands of satisfied clients and freelancers who trust Einsatz for their local service needs

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
cta.description: Join our platform today and experience the future of freelance services

freelancer.securePayments: Secure payments, released only when you approve

filters.title: Filters
filters.wildcardSearchDescription: Find freelancers based on broader skill categories rather than specific skills.

search.placeholder: Search by name, skills, or location

bookings.title: Upcoming Bookings
bookings.bookingsWillAppear: Bookings will appear here when clients book your services

profile.title: Profile
profile.yourPhotoDescription: This will be displayed on your profile
profile.locationVerified: Your location has been verified. Clients will be able to find you based on your location and service radius.
profile.bioPlaceholder: Tell clients about yourself, your experience, and expertise...
profile.bioDescription: A good bio helps clients understand your background and skills.
profile.defaultHourlyRateDescription: This is your default rate. You can set specific rates for each job category.
profile.jobOfferingsDescription: Manage your services and expertise in the dedicated job offerings page.

completeness.title: Profile Completeness
completeness.complete: Your profile is complete! Great job!
completeness.good: Your profile is looking good! Add a few more details to make it even better.
completeness.partial: Your profile is partially complete. Add more information to improve your visibility.
completeness.needsInfo: Your profile needs more information. Complete it to increase your chances of getting hired.

hints.firstName: Your first name as it appears on official documents
hints.lastName: Your last name as it appears on official documents
hints.email: A valid email address where clients can reach you
hints.phone: Your contact number including country code (e.g., +31)
hints.bio: Your bio is your chance to make a great first impression. Tell potential clients about your experience, skills, and what makes you unique.
hints.bioTips: Tips for writing a great bio:
hints.bioTip1: Start with a brief introduction of who you are
hints.bioTip2: Highlight your key skills and experience
hints.bioTip3: Mention any certifications or special qualifications

wildcardCategories.title: Wildcard Categories
wildcardCategories.description: Select the types of work you're willing to do. This helps clients find you even if they don't know your specific skills.
wildcardCategories.enableWildcardDescription: Allow clients to find you through wildcard categories
wildcardCategories.enableWildcardTooltip: Let clients find you even if they're unsure what exact service they need.
wildcardCategories.selectCategoriesDescription: Choose the types of work you're willing to do

physical_work.label: Physical Work
physical_work.description: I'm able-bodied and can perform physical tasks

customer_facing.label: Customer-Facing Work
customer_facing.description: I have good representation and communication skills

outdoor_work.label: Outdoor Work
outdoor_work.description: I don't mind working in different weather conditions

odd_hours.label: Flexible Hours
odd_hours.description: I'm available to work early mornings, late nights, or weekends

repetitive_work.label: Repetitive Tasks
repetitive_work.description: I don't mind repetitive or routine work

analytical_work.label: Analytical Work
analytical_work.description: I have problem-solving and analytical skills

creative_work.label: Creative Work
creative_work.description: I have creative skills and innovative thinking

wildcardCategories.updateSuccess: Your wildcard settings have been updated successfully.
wildcardCategories.updateError: Failed to save your wildcard settings. Please try again.

jobOfferings.title: Job Offerings
jobOfferings.description: Manage your services and expertise in the dedicated job offerings page.
jobOfferings.cardDescription: Add and manage the services you offer to clients
jobOfferings.cardNoOfferings: You haven't added any job offerings yet.
jobOfferings.cardAddOfferings: Add job categories below to start receiving bookings.
jobOfferings.cardMaxOfferingsDescription: You have reached the maximum of 3 job offerings. To add a new offering, please remove an existing one first.

bookings.title: Bookings
bookings.bookingsWillAppear: Bookings will appear here when clients book your services
bookings.noUpcomingBookingsClient: You haven't booked any freelancers yet. Start by finding the perfect match for your project!
bookings.noUpcomingBookingsFreelancer: Your profile is live! Update your availability and skills to attract more clients.
bookings.pastBookingsClient: Your completed bookings will appear here. Start by finding a freelancer for your next project!
bookings.pastBookingsFreelancer: Your completed bookings will appear here. Keep your profile updated to attract more clients!

bookingform.describeJob: Describe what you need help with...
bookingform.byBooking: By booking, you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy
bookingform.somethingWentWrong: Something went wrong. Please try again.
bookingform.pleaseSelectBothStartAndEndTimes: Please select both start and end times
bookingform.takingTooLongToLoadAvailability: Taking too long to load availability. Please try again.

payments.title: Payments
payments.paymentsWillAppear: Payments will appear here when clients pay you
payments.completePaymentToConfirmBooking: Complete your payment to confirm the booking
payments.paymentHeldSecurelyUntilJobIsComplete: Payment is held securely until you confirm the job is complete.
payments.makePaymentAsAgreedAndAskFreelancerToMar: Make the payment as agreed and ask the freelancer to mark the booking as paid on the platform.
payments.discussAndAgreeOnPaymentMethod: Discuss and agree on a payment method that works for both of you (cash, bank transfer, etc.).
payments.useOurMessagingSystemToCoordinatePayment: Use our messaging system to coordinate payment details with the freelancer.
payments.paymentInstructionsDescription: Please follow the instructions below to make the payment.
payments.paymentInstructionsDescription2: If you have any questions, please contact the freelancer directly.
payments.paymentInstructionsDescription3: If you have any issues, please contact our support team.
payments.offlinePaymentInstructionsDescription: Please follow the instructions below to make the payment.
payments.offlinePaymentInstructionsMessage: Message the freelancer to coordinate the payment.
payments.platformDoesNotStorePaymentInformation: Platform does not store payment information. All payments are processed through the platform's secure payment gateway.
payments.platformDoesNotHandleOfflinePayments: Platform does not handle offline payments. All payments are processed through the platform's secure payment gateway.
payments.alwayskeeprecordsOfPayments: Always keep records of payment. This will help you in case of any disputes.
payments.freelancerneedstoconfirmpayment: The freelancer needs to confirm the payment before it is released.
payments.disputecontactsupport: Dispute contact support if you have any issues.

id.offlinePaymentManagementDescription: This booking uses offline payment. Once you've received payment from the client, please mark it as paid.
id.yourReviewHelpsOthersMakeInformedDecisio: Your review helps others make informed decisions.
id.needHelpDescription: If you have any questions or need assistance with this booking, our support team is here to help.
id.thankYouForSharingYourFeedback: Thank you for sharing your feedback
id.yourReviewWillBePublishedAfterApproval: Your review will be published after approval.

availability.noAvailability: No availability set for this date
